00013 #include <cassert>
00014 
00015 namespace glm{
00016 namespace detail
00017 {
00018         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00019         struct compute_areCollinear{};
00020 
00021         template <typename T, precision P>
00022         struct compute_areCollinear<T, P, tvec2>
00023         {
00024                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static bool call(detail::tvec2<T, P> const & v0, detail::tvec2<T, P> const & v1, T const & epsilon)
00025                 {
00026                         return length(cross(detail::tvec3<T, P>(v0, static_cast<T>(0)), detail::tvec3<T, P>(v1, static_cast<T>(0)))) < epsilon;
00027                 }
00028         };
00029 
00030         template <typename T, precision P>
00031         struct compute_areCollinear<T, P, tvec3>
00032         {
00033                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static bool call(detail::tvec3<T, P> const & v0, detail::tvec3<T, P> const & v1, T const & epsilon)
00034                 {
00035                         return length(cross(v0, v1)) < epsilon;
00036                 }
00037         };
00038 
00039         template <typename T, precision P>
00040         struct compute_areCollinear<T, P, tvec4>
00041         {
00042                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static bool call(detail::tvec4<T, P> const & v0, detail::tvec4<T, P> const & v1, T const & epsilon)
00043                 {
00044                         return length(cross(detail::tvec3<T, P>(v0), detail::tvec3<T, P>(v1))) < epsilon;
00045                 }
00046         };
00047 
00048         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00049         struct compute_isCompNull{};
00050 
00051         template <typename T, precision P>
00052         struct compute_isCompNull<T, P, tvec2>
00053         {
00054                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static detail::tvec2<bool, P> call(detail::tvec2<T, P> const & v, T const & epsilon)
00055                 {
00056                         return detail::tvec2<bool, P>(
00057                                 (abs(v.x) < epsilon),
00058                                 (abs(v.y) < epsilon));
00059                 }
00060         };
00061 
00062         template <typename T, precision P>
00063         struct compute_isCompNull<T, P, tvec3>
00064         {
00065                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static detail::tvec3<bool, P> call(detail::tvec3<T, P> const & v, T const & epsilon)
00066                 {
00067                         return detail::tvec3<bool, P>(
00068                                 (abs(v.x) < epsilon),
00069                                 (abs(v.y) < epsilon),
00070                                 (abs(v.z) < epsilon));
00071                 }
00072         };
00073 
00074         template <typename T, precision P>
00075         struct compute_isCompNull<T, P, tvec4>
00076         {
00077                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static detail::tvec4<bool, P> call(detail::tvec4<T, P> const & v, T const & epsilon)
00078                 {
00079                         return detail::tvec4<bool, P>(
00080                                 (abs(v.x) < epsilon),
00081                                 (abs(v.y) < epsilon),
00082                                 (abs(v.z) < epsilon),
00083                                 (abs(v.w) < epsilon));
00084                 }
00085         };
00086 
00087 }//namespace detail

00089         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00090         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool areCollinear
00091         (
00092                 vecType<T, P> const & v0,
00093                 vecType<T, P> const & v1,
00094                 T const & epsilon
00095         )
00096         {
00097                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<T>::is_iec559, "'areCollinear' only accept floating-point inputs");
00098 
00099                 return detail::compute_areCollinear<T, P, vecType>::call(v0, v1, epsilon);
00100         }
00101 
00102         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00103         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool areOrthogonal
00104         (
00105                 vecType<T, P> const & v0,
00106                 vecType<T, P> const & v1,
00107                 T const & epsilon
00108         )
00109         {
00110                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<T>::is_iec559, "'areOrthogonal' only accept floating-point inputs");
00111 
00112                 return abs(dot(v0, v1)) <= max(
00113                         static_cast<T>(1),
00114                         length(v0)) * max(static_cast<T>(1), length(v1)) * epsilon;
00115         }
00116 
00117         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00118         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool isNormalized
00119         (
00120                 vecType<T, P> const & v,
00121                 T const & epsilon
00122         )
00123         {
00124                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<T>::is_iec559, "'isNormalized' only accept floating-point inputs");
00125 
00126                 return abs(length(v) - static_cast<T>(1)) <= static_cast<T>(2) * epsilon;
00127         }
00128 
00129         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00130         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool isNull
00131         (
00132                 vecType<T, P> const & v,
00133                 T const & epsilon
00134         )
00135         {
00136                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<T>::is_iec559, "'isNull' only accept floating-point inputs");
00137 
00138                 return length(v) <= epsilon;
00139         }
00140 
00141         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00142         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER vecType<bool, P> isCompNull
00143         (
00144                 vecType<T, P> const & v,
00145                 T const & epsilon
00146         )
00147         {
00148                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<T>::is_iec559, "'isCompNull' only accept floating-point inputs");
00149 
00150                 return detail::compute_isCompNull<T, P, vecType>::call(v, epsilon);
00151         }
00152 
00153         template <typename T, precision P>
00154         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec2<bool, P> isCompNull
00155         (
00156                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & v,
00157                 T const & epsilon)
00158         {
00159                 return detail::tvec2<bool, P>(
00160                         abs(v.x) < epsilon,
00161                         abs(v.y) < epsilon);
00162         }
00163 
00164         template <typename T, precision P>
00165         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3<bool, P> isCompNull
00166         (
00167                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & v,
00168                 T const & epsilon
00169         )
00170         {
00171                 return detail::tvec3<bool, P>(
00172                         abs(v.x) < epsilon,
00173                         abs(v.y) < epsilon,
00174                         abs(v.z) < epsilon);
00175         }
00176 
00177         template <typename T, precision P>
00178         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec4<bool, P> isCompNull
00179         (
00180                 detail::tvec4<T, P> const & v,
00181                 T const & epsilon
00182         )
00183         {
00184                 return detail::tvec4<bool, P>(
00185                         abs(v.x) < epsilon,
00186                         abs(v.y) < epsilon,
00187                         abs(v.z) < epsilon,
00188                         abs(v.w) < epsilon);
00189         }

00191         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00192         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool areOrthonormal
00193         (
00194                 vecType<T, P> const & v0,
00195                 vecType<T, P> const & v1,
00196                 T const & epsilon
00197         )
00198         {
00199                 return isNormalized(v0, epsilon) && isNormalized(v1, epsilon) && (abs(dot(v0, v1)) <= epsilon);
00200         }
